name: politico
text: The bill, which passed along mostly party lines, would ban chokeholds, end the use of “no-knock” warrants, create a national database to track officer wrongdoing and make it easier to prosecute police officers who harm or kill civilians while on the job https://t.co/ryTPneznMa

name: politico
text:
The Democrats' bill, which passed along mostly party lines, would

• ban chokeholds
• ban “no-knock” warrants
• create a national database to track police officer wrongdoing
• make it easier to prosecute officers who harm civilians while on the job https://t.co/ryTPneznMa

text:
Trump and GOP governors are pointing to fewer coronavirus deaths to suggest that the worst of the pandemic has passed.
